original_title: Troublesome Secretaries, or How Betty Outwitted Her Father
overview: This is basically a two practical-joke comedy. Bunny is a businessman father and Mabel plays Betty, his lovable daughter. The first practical joke is Betty getting her girlfriend to be daddy's secretary. The secretary sprays perfume on all his papers and tries to make out with him. The second practical joke has Betty getting her boyfriend to put on a wig and old man's outfit and apply for the job of daddy's secretary.
title: Troublesome Secretaries, or How Betty Outwitted Her Father
